sourcesContent: import{jsx as r}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{ComponentClassNames as n}from"../shared/constants.js";import"tslib";import"classnames";import"../View/View.js";import{IconCheckCircle as o}from"../Icon/icons/IconCheckCircle.js";import{IconError as e}from"../Icon/icons/IconError.js";import{IconInfo as s}from"../Icon/icons/IconInfo.js";import{IconWarning as i}from"../Icon/icons/IconWarning.js";const a=({variation:a,ariaHidden:c})=>{switch(a){case"info":return r(s,{"aria-hidden":c,className:n.AlertIcon});case"error":return r(e,{"aria-hidden":c,className:n.AlertIcon});case"warning":return r(i,{"aria-hidden":c,className:n.AlertIcon});case"success":return r(o,{"aria-hidden":c,className:n.AlertIcon});default:return null}};a.displayName="AlertIcon";export{a as AlertIcon};
